full_text: Yes!!! I sold a book!!! Sweet! #indieauthor #writingvswriter2022 #books #amquerying #amwriting #WritingCommnunity

Happy Friday junior. Please give my book a chance. I love it- I hope you will too! 

Principle Jones: The Revelation of a Shooting https://t.co/cfrk7nQAFG #Amazon

Education (high school), a family ( The Metlus crew) and a shooting. Why? And who, if anyone, ever ends up ok.
